body: Damn that kinda sucks for him

It starts with the succubus asking him for sex (he’d just get wasted for 2-3 days, cheap price to pay). Rui, the boy, refused, so Lily entered his body instead. With Daiki, the friend, Lily think he’s hot, so she took over and charmed him. The friend got a girlfriend by the way. Luckily he wouldn’t remember what happened after this. In the changing room, Rui unconsciously choose to change; Lily said that’s because Rui is not a virgin anymore, he knew the pleasure. In the end of the gangbang, Lily used the energy she gathered to alter the reality so Rui is always a girl from the beginning. To be continued?
